content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We recognise that for some of you, flexibility in your work location might be very important for various different reasons and working from a location outside of your country of employment mighty be required as an exceptional, temporary, and short-term arrangement. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If your request to work remotely for a short period of time has been approved, it is crucial that you are aware of EPAM basic recommendations in terms of health and safety when working outside your normal place of work. This short H&S course will provide you with few rules of protection, which, once learned, will help you to prevent unwanted work accidents. EPAM generic safety rules must be also followed when performing work from any place other than office facilities. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" For more detailed information on EMEA Remote Working Guidelines, please refer to our dedicated \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMTRVTE/EMEA+Remote+Working+Guidelines\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"KB Page\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
